code:
stateDiagram-v2
    direction LR

    [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic] --> NEW: Thread created
    NEW --> RUNNABLE: thread.start(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)

    subgraph Thread Scheduler
        RUNNABLE
        RUNNING
    end

    RUNNABLE --> RUNNING: CPU time allocated
    RUNNING --> RUNNABLE: Yield / Time slice end

    RUNNING --> BLOCKED: Enters synchronized block
    BLOCKED --> RUNNABLE: Exits synchronized block

    RUNNING --> WAITING: object.wait(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    WAITING --> RUNNABLE: object.notify(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) / notifyAll(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)

    RUNNING --> TIMED_WAITING: Thread.sleep(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) / object.wait(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    TIMED_WAITING --> RUNNABLE: Timeout / notify(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)

    RUNNING --> TERMINATED: run(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) completes
    TERMINATED --> [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
repo_description: Project for all the article details I have learn day by day
